item.title: Virat Kohli after helping India beat Pakistan: 'My best innings till date'
item.description: Virat Kohli after helping India beat Pakistan: ‘My best innings till date’ Kohli scored an unbeaten 82 off 53 balls at MCGHe helped India defeat Pakistan by 4 wicketsIt was Kohli’s 34th half-century in T20Is

item.title: Kohli played his 'best innings for India,' says Rohit after 4-wicket win over Pakistan
item.description: Kohli played his ‘best innings for India,’ says Rohit after 4-wicket win over Pakistan Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 82He put up 113 runs with Hardik for the fifth wicketIndia’s next game is on Oct.
